name: Arcanine
Ability1Text: As long as Arcanine has any Fire Energy attached to it, Arcanine has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: You may do 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Arcanine is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Arcanine. This attack does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Arcanine.

name: Bastiodon GL
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Bastiodon GL.

name: Darkrai G
Ability1Text: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon that remains Asleep between turns.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, that Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Floatzel GL
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Supporter cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: Floatzel GL can't use Giant Wave during your next turn.

name: Flygon
Ability1Text: If any basic Energy card attached to Flygon is the same type as any of your Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for those Pokémon is 0.
Attack1Text: Discard a Stadium card your opponent has in play. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flygon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Evolved Pokémon on your Bench.

name: Froslass GL
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by any Special Conditions, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokémon.

name: Jirachi
Ability1Text: Once during your opponent's turn, if Jirachi would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: If you have a Supporter card in play, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

name: Lucario GL
Ability1Text: Apply Weakness for each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) as ×2 instead.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Luxray GL
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

name: Mismagius GL
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, discard all Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Rampardos GL
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Roserade GL
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by any Special Conditions, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokémon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Shiftry
Ability1Text: As long as Shiftry is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her turn, treat it as tails.
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies during your opponent's next turn.

name: Aggron
Attack1Text: If Aggron was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to Aggron to the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: You may discard the top card of your deck. If you do, remove 2 damage counters and all Special Conditions from Aggron.

name: Beedrill
flavorText: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Ignore this effect if any of your Pokémon used Needle Shock during your last turn.

name: Bronzong E4
Attack1Text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 4 cards. (You draw your cards first.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Drapion E4
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Espeon E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Flareon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Flareon and put Flareon into your hand. This power can't be used if Flareon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack2Text: If Flareon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Gallade E4
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Gastrodon East Sea
Ability1Text: If Gastrodon East Sea is switched or retreats to your Bench, move as many Energy cards attached to Gastrodon East Sea as you like to the new Active Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Gastrodon and put them onto your Bench as Basic Pokémon. Put 2 damage counters on each of them. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Gastrodon West Sea
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon and 10 damage to each of your opponent's other Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Golem E4
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Golem GL.
Attack2Text: Golem E4 does 60 damage to itself.

name: Heracross E4
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Heracross E4's Megahorn attack's base damage is 100.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Hippowdon
Ability1Text: As long as Hippowdon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon LV.X between turns.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Hippowdon. Before doing damage, you may search your discard pile for a Fighting Energy card and attach it to Hippowdon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

name: Jolteon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Jolteon and put Jolteon into your hand. This power can't be used if Jolteon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: If Jolteon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

name: Mamoswine GL
Ability1Text: As long as Mamoswine GL is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (excluding Water Pokémon) (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Mr. Mime E4
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. Remove a number of damage counters equal to the number of heads from your Pokémon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Mr. Mime E4 by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Nidoking
Ability1Text: If your Active Pokémon is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon. You can't put more than 2 damage counters in this way.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 30 instead of 60 and this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidoqueen
Ability1Text: At any times between turns, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Maternal Comfort Poké-Body between turns.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Raichu GL
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

name: Rhyperior E4
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: It stops eating only to sleep. It doesn't feel full unless it eats nearly 900 pounds a day.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, both Snorlax and the Defending Pokémon are now Asleep. If tails, Snorlax is now Asleep.

name: Vaporeon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Vaporeon and put Vaporeon into your hand. This power can't be used if Vaporeon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If Vaporeon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 60 damage instead.

name: Vespiquen E4
Ability1Text: When you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Vespiquen E4, remove 1 damage counter from Vespiquen E4.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Grass Energy attached to Vespiquen E4. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Walrein
flavorText: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Walrein from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may attach as many Water Energy cards from your hand to Walrein as you like.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Walrein and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Yanmega E4
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Alakazam E4
Attack1Text: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to Alakazam E4 and remove 4 damage counters from Alakazam E4.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Electrode G
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Electrode G does 100 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Electrode G to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Gengar GL
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. You may shuffle Gengar GL and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

name: Glaceon
Ability1Text: As long as Glaceon is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent doesn't discard a card from his or her hand, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Hippowdon E4
Ability1Text: If Hippowdon E4 has any Fighting Energy attached to it, any damage done to Hippowdon E4 by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Infernape E4
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Lairon
flavorText: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Lairon. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Lairon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Leafeon
Ability1Text: As long as Leafeon is your Active Pokémon, whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, remove 2 damage counters from that Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Machamp GL
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Put the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward. (If your opponent doesn't have any Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.)

name: Rapidash E4
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Scizor E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Sharpedo
Ability1Text: If Sharpedo is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Sharpedo is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Attacking Pokémon.
Attack1Text: If an attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage to that Pokémon until the end of your next turn.

name: Starmie
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Water Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Starmie is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Starmie and the Defending Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, remove 4 damage counters from Starmie.
Attack2Text: Starmie can't attack during your next turn.

name: Steelix GL
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Steelix GL. If you do, remove 1 damage counter from Steelix GL.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tropius
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tropius during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Remove all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Grass Pokémon.

name: Vibrava
flavorText: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Energy cards in your opponent's discard pile. Then, put those Energy cards on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Whiscash E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Aerodactyl GL
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from his or her hand to Evolve or to Level-Up the Defending Pokémon during his or her next turn.

name: Ambipom G
Attack1Text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 60.

name: Aron
flavorText: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Carvanha
flavorText: They swarm any foes that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards that evolve from Eevee, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Switch Eevee with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Flareon E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon .

name: Forretress G
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Forretress G can't use Shell Scatter during your next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If tails, Forretress G does 80 damage to itself.

name: Gliscor E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Growlithe
flavorText: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to Growlithe. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Growlithe does 10 damage to itself.

name: Hippopotas
flavorText: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Houndoom E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Kakuna
flavorText: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to Kakuna by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Kecleon
flavorText: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
Ability1Text: Kecleon's type is Grass Fire Water Lightning Psychic Fighting Darkness Metal Colorless.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Koffing
flavorText: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Koffing does 30 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Munchlax
flavorText: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Snorlax from your hand onto Munchlax (this counts as evolving Munchlax) and remove all damage counters from Munchlax.
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 6 damage counters from Munchlax. Munchlax is now Asleep.

name: Munchlax
flavorText: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Snorlax from your hand onto Munchlax (this counts as evolving Munchlax) and remove all damage counters from Munchlax.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidoran ♀
flavorText: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidoran ♂
flavorText: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidorina
flavorText: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than NIDORINO's.
Attack1Text: Nidorina does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.
Attack2Text: If Nidorina has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Nidorino
flavorText: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that doesn't have any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Nuzleaf
flavorText: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

name: Quagsire GL
Ability1Text: As long as Quagsire GL is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to Quagsire GL by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Attack1Text: You may switch Quagsire GL with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Sealeo
flavorText: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Seedot
flavorText: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if Seedot would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Seedot if that damage is 40 or less.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Shellos East Sea
flavorText: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Shellos West Sea
flavorText: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. Choose 1 of your Pokémon. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from that Pokémon.

name: Snorlax
Ability1Text: As long as Snorlax is Asleep, your opponent's Active Pokémon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: If Snorlax is Asleep, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage. (This attack can be used even if Snorlax is Asleep.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If tails, Snorlax is now Asleep.

name: Spheal
flavorText: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Staryu
flavorText: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokémon in play, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

name: Trapinch
flavorText: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Trapinch is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Fighting Energy card and attach it to Trapinch.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Trapinch.

name: Turtwig GL
Ability1Text: As long as Turtwig GL's remaining HP is 60 or less, each of Turtwig GL's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: After your attack, remove from Turtwig GL the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Weedle
flavorText: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 5 Pokémon, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Weezing
Ability1Text: If Weezing is Confused and is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take a Prize card.
Attack1Text: Count the number of damage counters on Weezing. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon and Weezing is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Team Galactic's Invention G-107 Technical Machine G
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on the Pokémon this card is attached to to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Team Galactic's Invention G-109 SP Radar
Alakazam E4 LV.X
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon SP to another of your Pokémon SP. This power can't be used if Alakazam E4 is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Floatzel GL LV.X
Ability1Text: Whenever any of your Water Pokémon (excluding any Floatzel GL) is Knocked Out by damage from your opponent's attack, you may put that Pokémon and all cards that were attached to it from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack1Text: Choose as many Energy cards from your hand as you like and show them to your opponent. This attack does 20 damage times the number of Energy cards you chose. Put those Energy cards on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Flygon LV.X
Ability1Text: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, discard the top card from your opponent's deck between turns.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon LV.X. This attack does 150 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

name: Gallade E4 LV.X
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Gallade E4 LV.X from your hand onto your Active Gallade E4, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

name: Hippowdon LV.X
Ability1Text: Once during a game on your turn (before your attack), each player shuffles all cards in play (excluding Pokémon and Supporter cards) into his or her deck. You can't use more than 1 Sand Reset Poké-Power each game.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Fighting Energy attached to Hippowdon and choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Infernape E4 LV.X
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Infernape E4 is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Infernape E4.

name: Luxray GL LV.X
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Luxray GL LV.X from your hand onto your Active Luxray GL, you may switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Mismagius GL LV.X
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may return a Pokémon Tool or Technical Machine card attached to your Pokémon to your hand. This power can't be used if Mismagius GL is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. You can't put more than 8 damage counters in this way.

name: Snorlax LV.X
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Snorlax is your Active Pokémon, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If you do, Snorlax is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard as many Energy cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Snorlax.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

name: Flying Pikachu
flavorText: By learning how to fly, Pikachu overcame its weakness to Fighting Pokémon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flying Pikachu during your opponent's next turn.

name: Surfing Pikachu
flavorText: One summer, a group of Pikachu was found riding the waves at the local beach.

name: Fan Rotom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Fan Rotom's type is Colorless until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Fan Rotom.

name: Frost Rotom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Frost Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

name: Heat Rotom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Heat Rotom's type is Fire until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Mow Rotom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Mow Rotom's type is Grass until the end of your turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Wash Rotom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Wash Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
